Snikit.About: Some say Snikit went mad after being hit with a stray projectile. Others say he went mad after cracking his skull on a slippery sewer floor. Either way, this crazy Ratling rules the Assassin's Guild with an iron claw - at least when he feels like it.
Snikit.Event: Attacks immediately. Disengages at the end of each of his combats. On his turn, 50/50 whether he attacks or wanders randomly.

Krobus.Event:
Demonic portal opens. Will appear in 1-2 turns (enough for player to react for one turn).

Order has a chance to convince the demon to help them. Will turn hostile if fails.

egg1.About: The most feared Bounty Hunter in the city. Blah rushes from the shadows and captures her targets before they're aware she's even there.
egg1.Event: Appears on nearest board edge and hunts the target.

egg2.About: Frustratingly agile, blah is always one step ahead of everyone else. A thief notorious amongst the nobility, she is the mastermind behind numerous high-profile heists.
egg2.Event: Attacks immediately. Disengages at the end of each of his combats. On his turn, 50/50 whether he attacks or wanders randomly.

egg3.About: The current Pit Fighter champion, blah has won the last fifteen matches against largely unwilling opponents. His presence is preceded by the chanting of his adoring fans.
egg3.Event: Attacks immediately. Disengages at the end of each of his combats. On his turn, 50/50 whether he attacks or wanders randomly.

egg4.About: This self-proclaimed 'Prophet of the Blight' has supposedly been sent by greater powers to spread the gift of the Blight to all who will listen, and to all who won't. Blah's sermons, and those of his followers, bring a sense of foreboding to all those unlucky enough to hear them.
egg4.Event: Attacks immediately. Disengages at the end of each of his combats. On his turn, 50/50 whether he attacks or wanders randomly.

egg5.About: As the, now disgraced, head of the church within the city, blah has been heavily criticised for allowing the Blight to spread to all corners of the city. He is commonly seen throughout the city doing his best to heal the diseased and occasionally smite the forces of Chaos.
egg5.Event: Attacks immediately. Disengages at the end of each of his combats. On his turn, 50/50 whether he attacks or wanders randomly.

egg6.Event: Attacks immediately. Disengages at the end of each of his combats. On his turn, 50/50 whether he attacks or wanders randomly.
